help-file.title: HELLSPAWN
help-file.content:
A dealer of death, the Hellspawn is able to instinctively detect the target with the least vital energies remaining. Should they receive the killing blow, there is the possibility to "Spawn" a creature of Undead from the fresh corpse.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Sense Weakness
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 9th circle: Spawn
